sentence.Network_en: Parents can programme the machine not to turn on at certain times.

sentence.Network_en: I wish I knew how to turn on the heating.
sentence.Network_cn: 真希望我知道怎么开暖气。

sentence.Network_en: He could also turn on the style when the occasion demanded.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果场合需要，他也能瞬间就表现得风度翩翩。
